00030 /**
00031  * Class for the TCA 'select' field
00032  *
00033  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00034  * @version     1.0
00035  * @package     TYPO3
00036  * @subpackage  oop
00037  */
00038 class tx_oop_Tca_Field_Select extends tx_oop_Tca_Field
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * The type of the field
00042      */
00043     protected $_fieldType = 'select';
00044     
00045     /**
00046      * 
00047      */
00048     public function addItem( $value, $label = '' )
00049     {
00050         if( !isset( $this->_config[ 'items' ] ) || !is_array( $this->_config[ 'items' ] ) ) {
00051             
00052             $this->_config[ 'items' ] = array();
00053         }
00054         
00055         $label = ( $label ) ? $label : $this->_name . '.I.' . $value;
00056         
00057         $this->_config[ 'items' ][] = array( $label, $value );
00058     }
00059 }
